name: ui-autitester
description: Medical documentation system with patient profiles, case histories, and examination reports

scripts.test:api: newman run postman/postman-sample-collection.json --env-var baseUrl=https://postman-echo.com --env-var source=newman-sample-github-collection --env-var httpbinBaseUrl=https://httpbin.org --env-var httpbinUser=user --env-var httpbinPass=passwd --env-var bearerToken=my-demo-token
scripts.test:api:data: newman run postman/postman-sample-collection.json --iteration-data postman/input/patients.json --env-var baseUrl=https://postman-echo.com --env-var source=newman-sample-github-collection --env-var httpbinBaseUrl=https://httpbin.org --env-var httpbinUser=user --env-var httpbinPass=passwd --env-var bearerToken=my-demo-token
scripts.test:api:anything: newman run postman/postman-sample-collection.json --iteration-data postman/input/anything-cases.json --folder "httpbin: Anything POST (data-driven: path + headers + json)" --env-var httpbinBaseUrl=https://httpbin.org
